definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: shame Job 8:22 + 20 t.; sf. [[בָּשְׁתִּי]] Ps 69:20 + 7 t.

shame 1Sa 20:30, 1Sa 20:30, Ps 40:16, Ps 69:20, Ps 70:4, Is 30:3, Is 30:5, Is 61:7, Je 2:26, Je 3:25, Je 20:18, Hb Hab 2:10, Zep 3:5, Zep 3:19; [[לָבַשׁ בּשֶׁת]] clothe with shame Job 8:22, Ps 35:26, Ps 132:18; ‖[[עטה בשׁת]] Ps 109:29; [[פָּנִים]]([[ה]])[[בּשֶׁת ]] shame (or confusion) of face 2Ch 32:21, Ezr 9:7, Da 9:7, Da 9:8, cf. Ps 44:16, Je 7:19; [[בּשֶׁת עֲלוּמֶיךָ]] shame of thy youth Is 54:4; [[עֶרְיׇה־בשֶׁת]] nakedness (that is) shame Mic 1:11 cf. Ps 45:5; [[בּשֶׁת עֶרְוַת אמך]] 1Sa 20:30.

shameful thing, substituted for [[בַּעַל]] (q.v.) by later editors, Ho 9:10, Je 3:24; [[מִזְבְּחוֹת לַבּשֶׁת]] Je 11:13, cf. [[יְרֻבֶּשֶׁת]] 2Sa 11:21 = [[יְרֻבַּעַל]] Ju Jdg 6:32; [[אִישׁ־בּשֶׁת]] 2Sa 2:8 = [[אֶשְׁבַּעַל]] 1Ch 8:33.
